ctx: P: UMI C1 DualSIM + etui + BT slušalka Samsung
content:
Prodam pametni mobilni telefon UMI C1 temno sive barve + originalni etui + bluetooth slušalka Samsung.
5,5" HD zaslon, quad core, 16GB+1GB, 13.0MP, Android 4.4
Cena 129 €
Kontakt: 051/411-324
Ogled in prevzem v LJ.

 
	

	
	
		
		

		
			
		
		
	


	
		
	


 

SPECIFIKACIJE:
5.5inch LTPS, corning III gorilla glass, OGS screen,LTPS, corning III gorilla glass, OGS screen
MTK6582 quad core, cortex A7 1.3GHz
1GB RAM + 16GB ROM
Dual Camera: 3.2MP Front camera and 13.0MP Back Camera with flashlight
Dual SIM Card Dual Standby(One Micro SIM)
Support 3G/GPS/Bluetooth function
2G: GSM850/900/1800/1900MHz 3G: WCDMA 900/2100MHz
Main Features
Brand UMI
Model C1
Color White
Type Brand New
Operating System Android 4.4.2
Processor
MTK6582 quad core, Cortex A7 1.3GHz
RAM 1GB
ROM 16GB
Support extend card 32GB
Screen
Display Size(Inch) 5.5inch
Screen Type LTPS,corning III gorilla glass,OGS screen
Resolution 1280x720 pixels HD
Screen Color 16000K colors
Other Function

Frequency
2G:GSM850/900/1800/1900MHz; 3G:WCDMA900/2100MHz
Data transfer USB/Bluetooth
WIFI 802.11 b/g/n
GPS YES,built-in "A-GPS"

English,Spanish,Portuguese,Russian,German, Greece, Arabic, French, Italian, Polish
and more languages.

SIM Slot 2
Camera Flashlight, Auto focus

TV N/A

Gravity Sensor﻿, Proximity sensor﻿﻿, Light sensor
Bluetooth 4.0

Battery Type Lithium
Capacity 2430 mAh
Software
MP3, MP4, calculator, ES file management, stopwatch, calendar, alarm clock, Google play, E-mail, G-mail, etc.
Net Weight 160g
Dimensions / WxDxH 154.5 X 76.5 X 7.9mm
Additional Features
Dual sim, Dual camera, Quad band, wifi, FM, ebook, mail, google play, gmap
